shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_HARD
The Kestrel
shipBlueprint.desc: This class of ship was decommissioned from Federation service years ago. After a number of refits and updates this classic ship is ready for battle.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_HARD_2
Red-Tail
shipBlueprint.unlock: Complete 2/3 of the Kestrel Cruiser Achievements to unlock this ship.
shipBlueprint.desc: This modified Kestrel class ship was created by a laser weapon aficionado.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_HARD_3
The Swallow
shipBlueprint.desc: This model was modified by pirates to utilize newly discovered technology. It can clone lost crewmembers and stun enemies.
shipBlueprint.unlock: Get to Sector 8 with the Kestrel Cruiser Type B and Advanced Mode enabled to unlock this ship.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_CIRCLE
The Torus
shipBlueprint.unlock: To unlock this Engi ship you'll need to get to the 5th sector with any layout of the Kestrel Cruiser.
shipBlueprint.desc: Although it may look like a pile of junk loosely held together, this well designed ship relies on drones and ion weaponry.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_CIRCLE_2
The Vortex
shipBlueprint.unlock: Complete 2/3 of the Engi Cruiser Achievements to unlock this ship.
shipBlueprint.desc: Heavily understaffed, this ship relies on drones to keep the ship running.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_CIRCLE_3
Tetragon
shipBlueprint.unlock: Get to Sector 8 with the Engi Cruiser Type B and Advanced Mode enabled to unlock this ship.
shipBlueprint.desc: The Engi were quick to adapt to the sudden surge of hacking technology - this ship is the result of their research.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_FED
The Osprey
shipBlueprint.unlock: There have been rumors of advanced ship construction in the Rebel Stronghold...
shipBlueprint.desc: This ship features the latest in Federation technology: an advanced beam weapon that pierces through shields!

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_FED_2
Nisos
shipBlueprint.unlock: Complete 2/3 of the Federation Cruiser Achievements to unlock this ship.
shipBlueprint.desc: This cruiser is equipped with powerful fire artillery -- your enemies will burn in flames!

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_FED_3
The Fregatidae
shipBlueprint.unlock: Get to Sector 8 with the Federation Cruiser Type B and Advanced Mode enabled to unlock this ship.
shipBlueprint.desc: With a Flak Artillery weapon and an improved Clonebay, only the most suicidal of infantry chooses to fly on this ship.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_ENERGY
The Adjudicator
shipBlueprint.unlock: Learn from the Zoltan that sometimes diplomacy works.
shipBlueprint.desc: The Zoltan's advanced shields technology gives this ship an edge during each battle.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_ENERGY_2
Noether
shipBlueprint.unlock: Complete 2/3 of the Zoltan Cruiser Achievements to unlock this ship.
shipBlueprint.desc: This ship starts with a weakened Shield system and must rely on its supershield.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_ENERGY_3
Cerenkov
shipBlueprint.unlock: Get to Sector 8 with the Zoltan Cruiser Type B and Advanced Mode enabled to unlock this ship.
shipBlueprint.desc: The designer of this ship was not willing to spend the money for a decent reactor. Instead it relies on its Zoltan crew and Backup Battery.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_MANTIS
The Gila Monster
shipBlueprint.unlock: The famous Mantis thief, KazaaakplethKilik, owns this ship. You'll have to "convince" him to help you.
shipBlueprint.desc: This warship is designed to enhance its crew for close combat missions.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_MANTIS_2
The Basilisk
shipBlueprint.unlock: Complete 2/3 of the Mantis Cruiser Achievements to unlock this ship.
shipBlueprint.desc: This warship encourages sending massive boarding parties and keeping strong defenses.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_MANTIS_3
The Theseus
shipBlueprint.unlock: Get to Sector 8 with the Mantis Cruiser Type B and Advanced Mode enabled to unlock this ship.
shipBlueprint.desc: With a large teleporter and weapons designed to impede enemy crew, this ship is deadly in the hands of a capable boarding party.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_JELLY
Man of War
shipBlueprint.unlock: One of the Slug ships must know something about this advanced cruiser. Perhaps you can "convince" them to tell you.
shipBlueprint.desc: Designed for use inside nebulas, this cruiser lacks sensors and relies instead on the guile and cunning of the Slugs.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_JELLY_2
The Stormwalker
shipBlueprint.unlock: Complete 2/3 of the Slug Cruiser Achievements to unlock this ship.
shipBlueprint.desc: This boarding ship has no medical facilities and must manage its explosives carefully to keep the crew alive.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_JELLY_3
Ariolimax
shipBlueprint.unlock: Get to Sector 8 with the Slug Cruiser Type B and Advanced Mode enabled to unlock this ship.
shipBlueprint.desc: Slugs are often skilled in the arts of misdirection and manipulation. With Hacking and Mind Control systems, this ship capitalizes on that fact.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_ROCK
Bulwark
shipBlueprint.unlock: Prove yourself to the Rockmen to earn this powerful cruiser.
shipBlueprint.desc: Similar to its designers, this super-dense behemoth uses brute force to overwhelm its foes.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_ROCK_2
Shivan
shipBlueprint.unlock: Complete 2/3 of the Rock Cruiser Achievements to unlock this ship.
shipBlueprint.desc: With no airlocks, this ship must rely entirely on its rock crew to put out fires.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_ROCK_3
Tektite
shipBlueprint.unlock: Get to Sector 8 with the Rock Cruiser Type B and Advanced Mode enabled to unlock this ship.
shipBlueprint.desc: Contact has been made with the Crystalline race and this cruiser was offered to the Federation as part of diplomatic discussions between the sister species.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_STEALTH
The Nesasio
shipBlueprint.unlock: This ship is being built near the Engi homeworlds. To unlock it you'll need to help them, but they only trust their own kind.
shipBlueprint.desc: Constructed for the Federation by the Engi, this ship is designed to use cloaking technology and speed to get behind enemy lines.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_STEALTH_2
DA-SR 12
shipBlueprint.unlock: Complete 2/3 of the Stealth Cruiser Achievements to unlock this ship.
shipBlueprint.desc: Built like a glass cannon, this ship is hard to handle. If its cloaking can keep it safe long enough to charge its weapon, few cruisers can withstand its might.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_STEALTH_3
Simo-H
shipBlueprint.unlock: Get to Sector 8 with the Stealth Cruiser Type B and Advanced Mode enabled to unlock this ship.
shipBlueprint.desc: This ship was part of an Engi experiment to make a power efficient version of the Zoltan shield. Unfortunately this required the removal of the Cloaking system.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_CRYSTAL
Bravais
shipBlueprint.unlock: Travel to a lost sector of the galaxy to find this powerful vessel.
shipBlueprint.desc: This powerful vessel is powered by the secret technologies of the lost Crystalline Beings.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_CRYSTAL_2
Carnelian
shipBlueprint.unlock: Complete 2/3 of the Crystal Cruiser Achievements to unlock this ship.
shipBlueprint.desc: Their unique racial ability makes the Crystal beings very adept at ship boarding. This ship was designed for such raiding parties.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_ANAEROBIC
Kruos
shipBlueprint.unlock: Entice the Lanius with a valuable fleet. Unlock 4 ships in addition to the Kestrel Cruiser to unlock this ship.
shipBlueprint.desc: The sharp knife-like structures make Lanius ships a sight to behold. This cruiser was adapted to support the other races of the Federation.

shipBlueprint.name: PLAYER_SHIP_ANAEROBIC_2
The Shrike
shipBlueprint.unlock: Complete 2/3 of the Lanius Cruiser Achievements to unlock this ship.
shipBlueprint.desc: The racial ability of the Lanius make them fearsome combatants in small quarters. Combine that with a Mind Control system and this ship is a force to be reckoned with.

systemBlueprint.name: clonebay
systemBlueprint.title: Clone Bay
systemBlueprint.desc: Automatically clones dead crewmembers, but with skill penalty. Each jump it automatically disperses medical treatment to crew, even if it is unpowered.

systemBlueprint.name: hacking
systemBlueprint.title: Hacking
systemBlueprint.desc: Launches a hacking drone at a system, locking down its doors and granting the ability to temporarily disable or disrupt it. Launched drone has a 10% chance to dodge projectiles. Requires drone part to launch.

systemBlueprint.name: battery
systemBlueprint.title: Backup Battery
systemBlueprint.desc: Provides a 30 second boost to your Reactor. Upgrading increases power capacity.

systemBlueprint.name: oxygen
systemBlueprint.title: Oxygen
systemBlueprint.desc: Refills the oxygen in the ship. Upgrading increases the rate of refill.

systemBlueprint.name: teleporter
systemBlueprint.title: Teleporter
systemBlueprint.desc: Allows you to send your crew-members to board enemy vessels.

systemBlueprint.name: cloaking
systemBlueprint.title: Cloaking
systemBlueprint.desc: Renders your ship invisible, increasing evasion by 60% and preventing the enemy ship from locking on with their weapons.

systemBlueprint.name: pilot
systemBlueprint.title: Piloting
systemBlueprint.desc: Allows the ship to make FTL jumps and dodge when piloted. Upgrading adds auto-pilot that allows some evasion even without a pilot.

systemBlueprint.name: medbay
systemBlueprint.title: Medbay
systemBlueprint.desc: Heals all crew-members within the Medbay room. Upgrading increases healing speed.

systemBlueprint.name: shields
systemBlueprint.title: Shields
systemBlueprint.desc: Powers your shields. Each additional barrier can block one shot.

systemBlueprint.name: artillery
systemBlueprint.title: Artillery
systemBlueprint.desc: Installs a signature superweapon that fires on its own, determined by your ship's class.

systemBlueprint.name: engines
systemBlueprint.title: Engines
systemBlueprint.desc: Powers the FTL drive and allows the ship to dodge. Upgrading improves dodge chance and the rate that your FTL drive charges.

systemBlueprint.name: weapons
systemBlueprint.title: Weapon Control
systemBlueprint.desc: Powers all of the ship's weapons. Upgrading lets you power more weapons at the same time.

systemBlueprint.name: drones
systemBlueprint.title: Drone Control
systemBlueprint.desc: Powers all of the ship's drones. Drones are automated robots that perform tasks like attacking enemy ships or repairing systems.

systemBlueprint.name: sensors
systemBlueprint.title: Sensors
systemBlueprint.desc: Reveals the interior of your ship and gives information about enemy ships.

systemBlueprint.name: doors
systemBlueprint.title: Door Control
systemBlueprint.desc: Remote interior door and airlock control. Upgrades to Blast Doors that impede fire and intruder movement.

augBlueprint.name: INJECTOR_PRC
augBlueprint.title: Piercing Injector
augBlueprint.desc: A one-time procedure that increases the shield piercing of one weapon by 1. Used at sector start. Can only be applied to a weapon in the weapons bay that will benefit from more shield piercing.

augBlueprint.name: INJECTOR_FRC
augBlueprint.title: Flame Injector
augBlueprint.desc: A one-time procedure that increases the fire chance of one weapon by 40%. Used at sector start. Can only be used on a weapon in the weapons bay with at least low fire chance.

augBlueprint.name: INJECTOR_BRC
augBlueprint.title: Breach Injector
augBlueprint.desc: A one-time procedure that increases the breach chance of one weapon by 40%. Used at sector start. Can only be applied to a weapon in the weapons bay with at least low breach chance.

augBlueprint.name: INJECTOR_CLD
augBlueprint.title: Cooldown Injector
augBlueprint.desc: A one-time procedure that reduces the cooldown of one weapon by 25%. Used at sector start. Can only be applied to a weapon in the weapons bay that will benefit from faster cooldown.

augBlueprint.name: INJECTOR_POW
augBlueprint.title: Power Injector
augBlueprint.desc: A one-time procedure that reduces the power cost of one weapon by 1 bar. Used at sector start. Cannot be applied to weapons that use only 1 power.

augBlueprint.name: INJECTOR_UNI
augBlueprint.title: Universal Injector
augBlueprint.desc: A one-time procedure that upgrades one weapon in some way. Used at sector start. Can be applied to any weapon in the weapons bay.

augBlueprint.name: O2_MASKS
augBlueprint.title: Emergency Respirators
augBlueprint.desc: Crew take hardly any damage from asphyxiation.

augBlueprint.name: EXPLOSIVE_REPLICATOR
augBlueprint.title: Explosive Replicator
augBlueprint.desc: Missile based weapons have a 50 percent chance of not using a missile.

augBlueprint.name: FIRE_EXTINGUISHERS
augBlueprint.title: Fire Suppression
augBlueprint.desc: Automatically extinguishes fires on the ship.

augBlueprint.name: FLEET_DISTRACTION
augBlueprint.title: Distraction Buoys
augBlueprint.desc: Leaves a false signal at sector start to delay Rebels 1 jump.

augBlueprint.name: TELEPORT_HEAL
augBlueprint.title: Reconstructive Teleport
augBlueprint.desc: Teleportation completely heals crew.

augBlueprint.name: BATTERY_BOOSTER
augBlueprint.title: Battery Charger
augBlueprint.desc: Backup Battery cools down 4 times faster.

augBlueprint.name: DEFENSE_SCRAMBLER
augBlueprint.title: Defense Scrambler
augBlueprint.desc: Prevents enemy defense drones from targeting anything.

augBlueprint.name: BACKUP_DNA
augBlueprint.title: Backup DNA Bank
augBlueprint.desc: Your crew is safe in clone storage even if the system is off or broken.

augBlueprint.name: HACKING_STUN
augBlueprint.title: Hacking Stun
augBlueprint.desc: All crew inside a room during a Hacking Pulse will be stunned for the duration.

augBlueprint.name: LIFE_SCANNER
augBlueprint.title: Lifeform Scanner
augBlueprint.desc: Detects the location of any life forms, even when sensors don't function.

augBlueprint.name: ZOLTAN_BYPASS
augBlueprint.title: Super Shield Bypass
augBlueprint.desc: Allows crew/bomb teleportation and mind control to work through Super Shields.

augBlueprint.name: NANO_MEDBAY
augBlueprint.title: Engi Med-bot Dispersal
augBlueprint.desc: Engi nano med-bots heal the crew outside of the med-bay (at a reduced speed). It requires Medbay to be powered.

augBlueprint.name: CREW_STIMS
augBlueprint.title: Mantis Pheromones
augBlueprint.desc: Your crew's movement speed is increased by 50 percent.

augBlueprint.name: SCRAP_COLLECTOR
augBlueprint.title: Scrap Recovery Arm
augBlueprint.desc: Allows the ship to collect 15 percent more scrap from any source.

augBlueprint.name: ADV_SCANNERS
augBlueprint.title: Long-Ranged Scanners
augBlueprint.desc: Gather more information about nearby stellar beacons on the star map.

augBlueprint.name: AUTO_COOLDOWN
augBlueprint.title: Automated Reloader
augBlueprint.desc: Cooldown between weapon shots is improved by 25 percent.

augBlueprint.name: SHIELD_RECHARGE
augBlueprint.title: Shield Charge Booster
augBlueprint.desc: Boosts the ship's shield recharge rate by 50 percent.

augBlueprint.name: WEAPON_PREIGNITE
augBlueprint.title: Weapon Pre-Igniter
augBlueprint.desc: First charge of weapons occurs before the start of a battle.

augBlueprint.name: FTL_BOOSTER
augBlueprint.title: FTL Accelerator
augBlueprint.desc: The ship's FTL Drive powers up 50 percent faster.

augBlueprint.name: FTL_JUMPER
augBlueprint.title: Advanced FTL Navigation
augBlueprint.desc: Allows the ship to jump to any previously visited Beacon.

augBlueprint.name: DRONE_RECOVERY
augBlueprint.title: Drone Recovery Arm
augBlueprint.desc: All non-destroyed drones will be retrieved when jumping, allowing their parts to be reused.

augBlueprint.name: FTL_JAMMER
augBlueprint.title: FTL Jammer
augBlueprint.desc: Scramble enemy ships' FTL computers, doubling the time it takes for them to jump.

augBlueprint.name: STASIS_POD
augBlueprint.title: Damaged Stasis Pod
augBlueprint.desc: This bizarre alien artifact appears to be barely operational. It has no practical function but perhaps someone can repair it.

augBlueprint.name: SLUG_GEL
augBlueprint.title: Slug Repair Gel
augBlueprint.desc: Slug ships secrete a thick gel that automatically repairs any hull breaches.

augBlueprint.name: ROCK_ARMOR
augBlueprint.title: Rock Armor Plating
augBlueprint.desc: Superior hull armor provides a 25 percent chance to negate incoming hull damage (hit systems will still be damaged).

augBlueprint.name: ENERGY_SHIELD
augBlueprint.title: Zoltan Shield
augBlueprint.desc: An unexplained technology creates this nearly impenetrable shield. Only the energy outburst from an FTL engine is powerful enough to recharge it.

augBlueprint.name: CLOAK_FIRE
augBlueprint.title: Stealth Weapons
augBlueprint.desc: Lets you fire weapons without interrupting your cloak.

augBlueprint.name: SYSTEM_CASING
augBlueprint.title: Titanium System Casing
augBlueprint.desc: All ship systems have a coating that provides a 25 percent chance to negate damage when hit (the hull will continue to bear the damage).

augBlueprint.name: ION_ARMOR
augBlueprint.title: Reverse Ion Field
augBlueprint.desc: Protects your ship from ion damage, giving a 75 percent chance to negate it entirely.

augBlueprint.name: DRONE_SPEED
augBlueprint.title: Drone Accelerator
augBlueprint.desc: All onboard drones move 250 percent faster.

augBlueprint.name: REPAIR_ARM
augBlueprint.title: Repair Arm
augBlueprint.desc: Repairs your hull every time you collect scrap, but reduces scrap collected by 10 percent. Scrap collection is not reduced when your hull is fully repaired.

augBlueprint.name: CRYSTAL_SHARDS
augBlueprint.title: Crystal Vengeance
augBlueprint.desc: Every time your ship takes damage, there is a 30 percent chance for an all shield-piercing crystalline shard to break off and fly at your enemy.

augBlueprint.name: TULLY_BOX
augBlueprint.title: Storage Box 'Tully'
augBlueprint.desc: A heavily-secured storage box that bears Federation insignia. An inscription etched into it reads: "Z Priority: Deliver to Tully ASAP". Did you find the destination?

itemBlueprint.name: fuel
itemBlueprint.title: FTL Fuel
itemBlueprint.desc: Powers the FTL Drive, which lets the ship travel via jump beacons. Each jump consumes one fuel.

itemBlueprint.name: drones
itemBlueprint.title: Drone Part
itemBlueprint.desc: Allows you to deploy drone schematics you've found. Each deployment costs one drone part.

itemBlueprint.name: missiles
itemBlueprint.title: Missile
itemBlueprint.desc: Multipurpose ammunition for any missile based weapon.

crewBlueprint.name: human
crewBlueprint.desc: A common person. Nothing particularly special.
crewBlueprint.title: Human

crewBlueprint.name: engi
crewBlueprint.desc: It's unclear if the 'Engi' are partly organic or entirely mechanical, but it's well known that they make exceptional engineers.
crewBlueprint.title: Engi

powerList.power: Repairs and extinguishes fires twice as fast
Inflicts half as much damage in combat

crewBlueprint.name: mantis
crewBlueprint.desc: The Mantis disregard for individual lives led to their evolution as a vicious warrior race.
crewBlueprint.title: Mantis

powerList.power: Repairs and extinguishes fires twice as slow

crewBlueprint.name: slug
crewBlueprint.desc: These telepathic Slugs are disliked throughout the Galaxy for their constant thievery and attempts at manipulation.
crewBlueprint.title: Slug

powerList.power: Telepathic powers reveal rooms and lifeforms even when sensors are down.

crewBlueprint.name: rock
crewBlueprint.desc: The 'Rockmen' of Vrachos IV are rarely seen and are known for their fortitude.
crewBlueprint.title: Rockman

crewBlueprint.name: energy
crewBlueprint.desc: The 'Zoltan' are allies of the 'Engi.' Their innate energy can power ship systems.
crewBlueprint.title: Zoltan

powerList.power: 15 damage to enemy crew on death

crewBlueprint.name: anaerobic
crewBlueprint.desc: These anaerobic beings seem friendly enough.
crewBlueprint.title: Lanius

powerList.power: Movement speed reduced but does not take damage from lack of oxygen

crewBlueprint.name: ghost
crewBlueprint.desc: This fully sentient hologram is controlled by an advanced AI.
crewBlueprint.title: Avatar

droneBlueprint.name: DRONE_BLINK_ATK
droneBlueprint.title: Light-Caster Combat Drone
droneBlueprint.desc: Its light pulses wreak havoc aboard the enemy ship.

droneBlueprint.name: DRONE_BLINK_DEF
droneBlueprint.title: Light-Caster Defense Drone
droneBlueprint.desc: Its accurate light pulses destroy any and all projectiles. Incredibly good.

droneBlueprint.name: DRONE_BLINK2_ATK
droneBlueprint.title: Light-Caster Combat Drone 2
droneBlueprint.desc: Its light pulses wreak havoc aboard the enemy ship.

droneBlueprint.name: DRONE_BLINK2_DEF
droneBlueprint.title: Light-Caster Defense Drone 2
droneBlueprint.desc: Its accurate light pulses destroy any and all projectiles. Incredibly good.

droneBlueprint.name: DRONE_BLINK3_ATK
droneBlueprint.title: Light-Caster Combat Drone 3
droneBlueprint.desc: Its light pulses wreak havoc aboard the enemy ship.

droneBlueprint.name: DRONE_BLINK3_DEF
droneBlueprint.title: Light-Caster Defense Drone 3
droneBlueprint.desc: Its accurate light pulses destroy any and all projectiles. Incredibly good.

droneBlueprint.name: DRONE_BLINK4_ATK
droneBlueprint.title: Light-Caster Combat Drone 4
droneBlueprint.desc: Its light pulses wreak havoc aboard the enemy ship.

droneBlueprint.name: DRONE_BLINK4_DEF
droneBlueprint.title: Light-Caster Defense Drone 4
droneBlueprint.desc: Its accurate light pulses destroy any and all projectiles. Incredibly good.

droneBlueprint.name: DRONE_BLINK5_ATK
droneBlueprint.title: Light-Caster Combat Drone 5
droneBlueprint.desc: Its light pulses wreak havoc aboard the enemy ship.

droneBlueprint.name: DRONE_BLINK5_DEF
droneBlueprint.title: Light-Caster Defense Drone 5
droneBlueprint.desc: Its accurate light pulses destroy any and all projectiles. Incredibly good.

weaponBlueprint.name: SLURM_BARREL_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Slurm Barrel
weaponBlueprint.desc: Filled with green slurm, this small barrel is highly sought after by traders. Not a weapon.

weaponBlueprint.name: SLURM_BARREL_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Slurm Barrel
weaponBlueprint.desc: Filled with green slurm, this large barrel is highly sought after by traders. Not a weapon.

weaponBlueprint.name: SLURM_BARREL_3
weaponBlueprint.title: Slurm Barrel
weaponBlueprint.desc: Filled with rare purple slurm, this small barrel is highly sought after by traders. Not a weapon.

weaponBlueprint.name: SLURM_BARREL_4
weaponBlueprint.title: Slurm Barrel
weaponBlueprint.desc: Filled with rare purple slurm, this large barrel is highly sought after by traders. Not a weapon.

weaponBlueprint.name: PDS_SHOT
weaponBlueprint.title: PDS SHOT
weaponBlueprint.desc: YOU SHOULD NEVER SEE THIS
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: YOU SHOULD NEVER SEE THIS.

weaponBlueprint.name: ENGI_ARTILLERY
weaponBlueprint.title: Engi Phase Artillery
weaponBlueprint.desc: The phase ion weapon's projectiles pierce shields and ionize them together with the systems. [40 ‡]
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Artillery: Fires a volley of phasing pulse projectiles which ignore shields, with each shot inflicting 1 ion damage to both shields and systems. [40 ‡]

weaponBlueprint.name: ARTILLERY_ROCK_X
weaponBlueprint.title: Rock Artillery Missiles X
weaponBlueprint.desc: A remarkable missile launcher. Helps in battle and doesn't require ammunition.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Artillery: A remarkable missile launcher. Helps in battle and doesn't require ammunition.

weaponBlueprint.name: TRAINING_COMPLEX
weaponBlueprint.title: Training Complex
weaponBlueprint.desc: Dummy beam weapon designed to train weapons operators as fast as possible.

weaponBlueprint.name: SHIPRADAR
weaponBlueprint.title: Directional Scanner
weaponBlueprint.desc: Dedicated scanning device able to reveal an image of any room, even in the absence of working sensors on the ship. Can scan rooms on your ship. Some other weapon must be powered in order for it to work.

weaponBlueprint.name: CRYSTAL_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Crystal Shard
weaponBlueprint.desc: No one should ever see this description.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: No one should ever see this description.

weaponBlueprint.name: ARTILLERY_FED
weaponBlueprint.title: Vindicator Beam Artillery
weaponBlueprint.desc: Powers a slow, high-powered beam that pierces all shields and does one damage per room hit. [40 ‡]
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Vindicator Beam Artillery: Automatically firing beam that pierces all shields, dealing 1 damage per room hit. [40 ‡]

weaponBlueprint.name: ARTILLERY_FED_FIRE
weaponBlueprint.title: Fire Beam Artillery
weaponBlueprint.desc: Powers a slow, high-powered beam that pierces all shields and deals 1 system damage per room hit, cutting through crew and possibly starting fires. [40 ‡]
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Fire Beam Artillery: Automatically firing beam that pierces all shields, dealing 1 system damage per room and 30 crew damage with a decent fire chance per room tile. [40 ‡]

weaponBlueprint.name: ARTILLERY_FED_C
weaponBlueprint.title: Flak Artillery
weaponBlueprint.desc: Powers a slow, high-powered flak cannon that fires ten projectiles. [40 ‡]
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Flak Artillery: Flak cannon that automatically fires 10 projectiles. [40 ‡]

weaponBlueprint.name: ARTILLERY_PL_HEAVY
weaponBlueprint.title: Laser Artillery
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires off five heavy piercing lasers all at once, which deal reduced damage to systems and crew. [40 ‡]
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Fires off five heavy piercing lasers all at once, which deal reduced damage to systems and crew. [40 ‡]

weaponBlueprint.name: ARTILLERY_PL_ION
weaponBlueprint.title: Ion Artillery
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires off a heavy ion projectile, which damages and disables a system without dealing hull damage. [40 ‡]
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Fires off a heavy ion projectile, which damages and disables a system without dealing hull damage. [40 ‡]

weaponBlueprint.name: ARTILLERY_PL_BEAM_K
weaponBlueprint.title: Stiletto-Artillery
weaponBlueprint.desc: This heavy beam artillery pierces all shields, but only deals hull damage. [40 ‡]
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: This heavy beam artillery pierces all shields, but only deals hull damage. [40 ‡]

weaponBlueprint.name: ARTILLERY_PL_BOMB_TIMER
weaponBlueprint.title: Timer-Artillery
weaponBlueprint.desc: Launches three bombs which each have a long fuse, but deal colossal crew damage and medium system damage. [40 ‡]
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Launches three bombs which each have a long fuse, but deal colossal crew damage and medium system damage. [40 ‡]

weaponBlueprint.name: ARTILLERY_PL_BOMB_BREACH
weaponBlueprint.title: Breach Bomb Artillery
weaponBlueprint.desc: Launches three bombs that deal high system and crew damage, and are guaranteed to breach. [40 ‡]
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Launches three bombs that deal high system and crew damage, and are guaranteed to breach. [40 ‡]

weaponBlueprint.name: ARTILLERY_PL_PLASMA
weaponBlueprint.title: Plasma Artillery
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires off all at once a large number of plasma rounds which pierce all shields. Very likely to start fires. [40 ‡]
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Fires off all at once a large number of plasma rounds which pierce all shields. Very likely to start fires. [40 ‡]

weaponBlueprint.name: ARTILLERY_PL_ONI
weaponBlueprint.title: Oni Artillery
weaponBlueprint.desc: Launches three heavy techno-missiles that cannot be intercepted by basic defense drones. [40 ‡]
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Launches three heavy techno-missiles that cannot be intercepted by basic defense drones. [40 ‡]

weaponBlueprint.name: ARTILLERY_PL_CRYSTAL_CYAN
weaponBlueprint.title: Crystalline Artillery
weaponBlueprint.desc: Launches three heavy breaching crystals, which create impassable barriers, but can be shot down by basic defense drones. [40 ‡]
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Launches three heavy breaching crystals, which create impassable barriers, but can be shot down by basic defense drones. [40 ‡]

weaponBlueprint.name: ARTILLERY_PL_CRYSTAL_RED
weaponBlueprint.title: Crystalline Artillery
weaponBlueprint.desc: Launches three heavy breaching crystals, which create impassable barriers, but can be shot down by basic defense drones. [40 ‡]
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Launches three heavy breaching crystals, which create impassable barriers, but can be shot down by basic defense drones. [40 ‡]

weaponBlueprint.name: ARTILLERY_PL_SHOTGUN
weaponBlueprint.title: Flak-Artillery
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires debris all at once across a random area, doing up to 8 damage. Great at taking down shields, but not so much at being accurate. [40 ‡]
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Fires debris all at once across a random area, doing up to 8 damage. Great at taking down shields, but not so much at being accurate. [40 ‡]

weaponBlueprint.name: ARTILLERY_PL_BEAM_V
weaponBlueprint.title: Artillery Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires off a beam of extreme length, dealing 1 damage to each room hit. Pierces through any number of shields. [40 ‡]
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Fires off a beam of extreme length, dealing 1 damage to each room hit. Pierces through any number of shields. [40 ‡]

weaponBlueprint.name: ARTILLERY_SLUG
weaponBlueprint.title: Slug Artillery
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires breach-capable paralyzing darts quite often. [4 ‡]
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Slug Artillery: Fires breach-capable paralyzing darts quite often. [4 ‡]

weaponBlueprint.name: ARTILLERY_ZOLTAN
weaponBlueprint.title: Zoltan Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: Powers a slow but powerful beam that inflicts 1 point of damage per room hit, piercing through any number of shield layers. [45 ‡]
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Artillery: Automatically firing all shield-piercing beam that does 1 damage per room hit. [45 ‡]

weaponBlueprint.name: ARTILLERY_CIVILIAN
weaponBlueprint.title: Order Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: Powers a slow, powerful beam that inflicts 1 system damage and 15 crew damage, piercing through any number of shield layers. Can set fire to rooms. [33 ‡]
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Artillery: Automatically firing all shield-piercing beam that does 1 system damage per room hit and 15 crew damage with a chance to light a fire per room tile. [33 ‡]

weaponBlueprint.name: SLURM_SMALL
weaponBlueprint.title: Small Slurm Queen
weaponBlueprint.desc: The Queen damages and stuns enemy crew, ignoring all shield bubbles. Fast recharge. [5 ‡]
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: The Queen stuns and deals 30 crew damage to enemy crew, ignoring all shield bubbles. [5 ‡]

weaponBlueprint.name: PREIGNITE_ION_IMPULSE_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Ion Single-Charge Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: Creates one small ionic flash that disperses ions all over the enemy ship.

weaponBlueprint.name: PREIGNITE_ION_IMPULSE_2

weaponBlueprint.name: PREIGNITE_ION_IMPULSE_3
weaponBlueprint.title: Ion Single-Charge Mark III
weaponBlueprint.desc: Creates one powerful ionic flash that disperses ions all over the enemy ship.

weaponBlueprint.title: Anti-Pers. Single-Charge I

weaponBlueprint.name: PREIGNITE_PP_IMPULSE_2
