weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires one medium salvo of debris over a wide area.

weaponBlueprint.name: PREIGNITE_SHOTGUN_IMPULSE_3
weaponBlueprint.title: Flak Single-Charge Mark III
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires one powerful salvo of debris over a wide area.

weaponBlueprint.name: PREIGNITE_PLASMA_IMPULSE_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Plasma Single-Charge Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires one small salvo of plasma.

weaponBlueprint.name: PREIGNITE_PLASMA_IMPULSE_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Plasma Single-Charge Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires one medium salvo of plasma rounds.

weaponBlueprint.name: PREIGNITE_PLASMA_IMPULSE_3
weaponBlueprint.title: Plasma Single-Charge Mark III
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires one powerful salvo of plasma rounds.

weaponBlueprint.name: SLURMGUN_A
weaponBlueprint.title: Slurmgun Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: This Slig light laser bypasses shields to damage crew and systems alike. Deals more damage to crew than systems.

weaponBlueprint.name: SLURMGUN_B
weaponBlueprint.title: Slurmgun Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: This Slig light laser bypasses shields to damage crew and systems alike. Deals more damage to systems than crew.

weaponBlueprint.name: SLURMGUN_C
weaponBlueprint.title: Slurmgun Mark III
weaponBlueprint.desc: This Slig light laser bypasses shields to cut away at crew and systems alike.

weaponBlueprint.name: PHOTO_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Photon Cannon Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: An ancient weapon preserved by generations of Lanius that fires medium-energy photons. Low accuracy is offset by low power consumption. Fires 3 consecutive shots per charge.

weaponBlueprint.name: PHOTO_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Photon Cannon Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: An ancient weapon preserved by generations of Lanius that fires medium-energy photons. More accurate than its predecessor. Fires 3 consecutive shots per charge.

weaponBlueprint.name: PHOTO_HEAVY_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Heavy Photon Cannon Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: An ancient weapon preserved by generations of Lanius that fires high-energy photons. Low accuracy is offset by increased damage. Fires 3 consecutive shots per charge.

weaponBlueprint.name: PHOTO_HEAVY_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Heavy Photon Cannon Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: An ancient weapon preserved by generations of Lanius that fires high-energy photons. More accurate than its predecessor. Fires 3 consecutive shots per charge.

weaponBlueprint.name: PHOTO_CHAINGUN
weaponBlueprint.title: Photon Chain Vulcan
weaponBlueprint.desc: This legendary ancient weapon is known only as myth to the Lanius. The most powerful of the modified Chain Vulcans.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_PIERCE_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Pierce Laser Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: This upgraded standard laser can pierce one shield bubble.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_PIERCE_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Pierce Laser Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: This upgraded standard laser can pierce one shield bubble. Recharges faster than its predecessor.

weaponBlueprint.name: SHTURM_LASER_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Assault Burst Laser Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: Simple burst-fire laser designed to damage personnel and hull alike.

weaponBlueprint.name: SHTURM_LASER_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Assault Burst Laser Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: Upgraded burst-fire laser designed to damage personnel and hull alike.

weaponBlueprint.name: RAIL_DRIVER
weaponBlueprint.title: Magnetic Rail Driver
weaponBlueprint.desc: This advanced weapon propels sharp ionized metal slugs at hypersonic speeds, piercing weak shields and unloading massive damage.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_HEAVY_CHAIN
weaponBlueprint.title: Chain Heavy Laser
weaponBlueprint.desc: This laser cannon speeds up after each attack, striking for major damage. After 3 volleys it takes only 5 seconds to charge.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_CHAINGUN
weaponBlueprint.title: Vulcan Gatling Laser
weaponBlueprint.desc: Takes a long time to warm up but eventually reaches a frightening rate of fire tough for any number of shields to withstand.

weaponBlueprint.name: HEAVY_MINIGUN
weaponBlueprint.title: Assault Chain Vulcan
weaponBlueprint.desc: This modified Chain Vulcan deals extra crew damage and fires twice as many shots per charge at the cost of cooldown.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_CHAINGUN_HEAVY
weaponBlueprint.title: Heavy Chain Vulcan
weaponBlueprint.desc: Heavy modification of the Chain Vulcan, boasting increased destructive power but slightly inaccurate.

weaponBlueprint.name: HEAVY_PPL
weaponBlueprint.title: Heavy Anti-Personnel Laser
weaponBlueprint.desc: This laser inflicts system damage and additional crew damage with each shot, while also able to pierce one shield bubble.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_AUTO_CHAIN
weaponBlueprint.title: Chain Auto-Laser
weaponBlueprint.desc: This auto-laser takes a bit of time to warm up, but when it does, it can continuously suppress enemy shields for other weapons.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_CHAIN_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Chain Burst Laser Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: This double-barreled laser decreases in cooldown the more it fires, warming up its barrels after every burst. After 3 volleys it only takes 7 seconds to charge.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_CHAIN_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Chain Burst Laser Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: This triple-barreled laser decreases in cooldown the more it fires, warming up its barrels after every burst. After 3 volleys it only takes 10 seconds to charge.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_CHAIN_3
weaponBlueprint.title: Chain Burst Laser Mark III
weaponBlueprint.desc: This triple-barreled laser decreases in cooldown the more it fires, warming up its barrels after every burst. After 4 volleys it only takes 8 seconds to charge.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_CHAIN_LONG_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Long Laser Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: Initially, it takes quite a while to get its first volley off, but thereafter it can fire every 5 seconds.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_CHAIN_LONG_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Long Laser Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: Initially, it takes quite a while to get its first volley off, but thereafter it can fire every 8 seconds.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_CHAIN_LONG_3
weaponBlueprint.title: Long Laser Mark III
weaponBlueprint.desc: Initially, it takes quite a while to get its first volley off, but thereafter it can fire every 6 seconds.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_FIRE_CHAINGUN
weaponBlueprint.title: Fire Chain Vulcan
weaponBlueprint.desc: This modified Chain Vulcan doesn't do any damage, but can set fire to rooms through any number of shields. Only needs a single second to charge when fully warmed up.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_HEAVY_CHARGE_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Heavy Charge Laser Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: This double-barreled heavy laser charges each of its shots one at a time. Slightly inaccurate.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_HEAVY_CHARGE_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Heavy Charge Laser Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: This triple-barreled heavy laser charges each of its shots one at a time. Slightly inaccurate.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_CHARGEGUN_PLUS
weaponBlueprint.title: Custom Charge Laser Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: This double-barreled laser charges each of its shots separately. This custom blueprint requires one less power.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_CHARGEGUN_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Charge Laser Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: This double-barreled laser charges each of its shots separately.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_CHARGEGUN_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Charge Laser Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: This triple-barrelled laser charges each of its shots separately. Rather versatile yet slow for its class.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_CHARGEGUN_3
weaponBlueprint.title: Charge Laser Mark III
weaponBlueprint.desc: This quadruple-barreled laser charges each of its shots separately. Recharges faster than its predecessor.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_CHARGEGUN_4
weaponBlueprint.title: Charge Laser Mark IV
weaponBlueprint.desc: This 'five-finger' laser design charges each of its five shots separately. Exceptionally versatile yet cumbersome to use.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_BURST_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Burst Laser Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: Common burst-fire laser known far and wide for its inefficiency. However, its quick response time enables its usage with a variety of setups.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_BURST_1P
weaponBlueprint.title: Custom Burst Laser Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: This custom blueprint's efficient power usage slices away its original bulkiness, while maintaining its quick response time.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_BURST_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Burst Laser Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: Uncommon burst-fire laser renowned for its efficiency, yet not quite as responsive as everyone claims.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_BURST_2P
weaponBlueprint.title: Custom Burst Laser Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: This custom blueprint requires one less power, making for astounding efficiency, though is still a bit hard to handle.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_BURST_3
weaponBlueprint.title: Burst Laser Mark III
weaponBlueprint.desc: Powerful burst laser that fires quite the projectile volley, though is somewhat cumbersome to use.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_BURST_3P
weaponBlueprint.title: Custom Burst Laser Mark III
weaponBlueprint.desc: This custom blueprint requires one less power, granting great efficiency, yet is still somewhat cumbersome to use.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_BURST_4
weaponBlueprint.title: Burst Laser Mark IV
weaponBlueprint.desc: Awesome burst laser that's able to maintain an impressive barrage, but needs quite a while to generate said barrage.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_BURST_4P
weaponBlueprint.title: Custom Burst Laser Mark IV
weaponBlueprint.desc: Awesome burst laser that's able to maintain an impressive barrage. This custom blueprint requires one less power, granting it great efficiency, but that doesn't solve its heavy-handed handling.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_BURST_5
weaponBlueprint.title: Burst Laser Mark V
weaponBlueprint.desc: Secret development in the field of burst-fire lasers. Equally responsive as its predecessor.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_AL_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Adaptive Laser Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires off a special charge which increases in damage with each volley, capping at 3 damage.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_AL_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Adaptive Laser Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires off two special charges which increase in damage with each volley, capping at 3 damage each.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_SUPER_HEAVY_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Superheavy Laser Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires off a powerful charge that deals 3 damage.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_SUPER_HEAVY_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Superheavy Laser Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires off two powerful charges, dealing 3 damage each.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_HEAVY_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Heavy Laser Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: Beefed-up standard laser that delivers a more solid punch.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_HEAVY_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Heavy Laser Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires two powerful shots in quick succession, each dealing a solid amount of damage, with potential to wreak havoc.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_HEAVY_PIERCE_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Heavy Pierce Laser Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: This upgraded heavy laser can pierce one shield bubble.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_HEAVY_PIERCE_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Heavy Pierce Laser Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: Each of this upgraded two-round heavy laser's shots can pierce one shield bubble.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_OLD
weaponBlueprint.title: Old Laser
weaponBlueprint.desc: This weapon's seen better days.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_TIRED
weaponBlueprint.title: Five-Shot Laser
weaponBlueprint.desc: This rapid-fire laser decreases in cooldown the more it fires and doesn't require power, but after firing 5 times it ceases to function. Requires an active weapon to function.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_VERY_OLD
weaponBlueprint.title: Rusty Laser
weaponBlueprint.desc: This laser is covered with a layer of rust.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_STANDARD_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Standard Laser Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: As basic as lasers get. Fires a single shot before needing to recharge.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_STANDARD_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Standard Laser Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires a single shot before needing to recharge. This newer model was modified with speed in mind.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_DUAL_OLD
weaponBlueprint.title: Old Dual Laser
weaponBlueprint.desc: These dual lasers have seen better days.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_DUAL_VERY_OLD
weaponBlueprint.title: Rusty Dual Lasers
weaponBlueprint.desc: These dual lasers' rotating barrels have rusted up tight.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_DUAL_ORDEN
weaponBlueprint.title: Chaos Dual Lasers Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: One of numerous dual laser modifications, this model was modified with Order tactics in mind, making it more likely to start a fire.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_DUAL_ORDEN_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Chaos Dual Lasers Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: One of numerous dual laser modifications, this model was modified with Order tactics in mind, making it more likely to start a fire. The Order improved upon this design by slightly reducing its cooldown.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_DUAL_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Dual Laser Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: What it lacks in pure firepower, it makes up for in efficiency and versatility.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_DUAL_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Dual Laser Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: What it lacks in pure firepower, it makes up for in efficiency and versatility. Modified to improve its cooldown further.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_LASER_WAR_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Military Laser Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: Advanced standard laser. Deals additional damage to enemy ship systems.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_LASER_WAR_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Military Laser Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: Advanced heavy laser. Deals additional damage to enemy ship systems.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_LASER_WAR_3
weaponBlueprint.title: Military Laser Mark III
weaponBlueprint.desc: Advanced dual laser. Deals additional damage to enemy ship systems.

weaponBlueprint.name: MPP_LASER_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Small AP Laser I
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires four non-piercing antipersonnel projectiles. Accuracy leaves much to be desired.

weaponBlueprint.name: MPP_LASER_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Small AP-Laser II
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires five non-piercing antipersonnel projectiles. Accuracy leaves much to be desired.

weaponBlueprint.name: LIGHT_BREACH_LASER_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Light Breach Laser Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: Anti-personnel laser designed to maximize its breaching potential.

weaponBlueprint.name: LIGHT_BREACH_LASER_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Light Breach Laser Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: Anti-personnel laser designed to maximize its breaching potential. This newer model was upgraded with cooldown and breach chance in mind.

weaponBlueprint.name: LIGHT_BREACH_VULCAN
weaponBlueprint.title: Light Breach Vulcan
weaponBlueprint.desc: This light laser frequently leaves behind holes.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_LIGHT_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Light Laser Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: Common anti-personnel laser. Fires twice, damaging crew. Ignores two shield bubbles but cannot bring them down.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_LIGHT_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Light Laser Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: Powerful anti-personnel laser. Fires 3 times, damaging crew. Ignores two shield bubbles but cannot bring them down.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_LIGHT_3
weaponBlueprint.title: Light Laser Mark III
weaponBlueprint.desc: Advanced anti-personnel laser. Fires 5 times, damaging crew. Ignores two shield bubbles but cannot bring them down.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_LIGHT_AUTO
weaponBlueprint.title: Light Auto-Laser
weaponBlueprint.desc: Thanks to high-speed recharging, this anti-personnel laser can keep the enemy crew under constant fire. Ignores two shield bubbles, but cannot bring them down.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_LIGHT_SCATTER_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Light Scatter Laser Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: Common anti-personnel laser. Pierces one shield bubble.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_LIGHT_SCATTER_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Light Scatter Laser Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: Powerful anti-personnel laser that deals great crew damage. Pierces one shield bubble.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_LIGHT_SCATTER_3
weaponBlueprint.title: Light Scatter Laser Mark III
weaponBlueprint.desc: Destructive anti-personnel laser that shreds crew to pieces. Pierces one shield bubble.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_LASER_LIGHT_ARTILLERY
weaponBlueprint.title: Light Artillery Laser
weaponBlueprint.desc: Destructive anti-personnel laser that shreds crew to pieces. Pierces three shield bubbles.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_LASER_LIGHT_CHAINGUN
weaponBlueprint.title: Light Chain Vulcan
weaponBlueprint.desc: A gatling variant of the light laser, decreasing in cooldown each time it fires, eventually being able to shred enemy crew very quickly. Pierces two shield bubbles.

weaponBlueprint.name: SHOTGUN_PLAYER_VERYOLD
weaponBlueprint.title: Rusty Flak Cannon
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires a blast of debris across a random area, doing up to 3 damage. Good at taking down shields but hard to aim. Cannon badly rusted.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_SHOTGUN_SMALL
weaponBlueprint.title: Small Flak Cannon
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires a small blast of debris across a random area, doing up to 2 damage. Good at taking down shields but hard to aim.

weaponBlueprint.name: SHOTGUN_PLAYER
weaponBlueprint.title: Advanced Flak Cannon
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires a blast of debris across a random area, doing up to 3 damage. Good at taking down shields but hard to aim. This special version is faster and requires one less power.

weaponBlueprint.name: SHOTGUN_007
weaponBlueprint.title: Chain Flak Cannon
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires a blast of debris across a random area, doing up to 3 damage. Decreases in cooldown the more it fires.

weaponBlueprint.name: SHOTGUN
weaponBlueprint.title: Flak Cannon Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires a blast of debris across a random area, doing up to 3 damage. Good at taking down shields but hard to aim.

weaponBlueprint.name: SHOTGUN_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Flak Cannon Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires a blast of debris across a random area, doing up to 7 damage. Good at taking down shields but hard to aim.

weaponBlueprint.name: SHOTGUN_3
weaponBlueprint.title: Flak Cannon Mark III
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires a blast of debris across a random area, doing up to 12 damage. Quite good at taking down shields but hard to aim.

weaponBlueprint.name: SHOTGUN_3_BROKEN
weaponBlueprint.title: Broken Flak Mark III
weaponBlueprint.desc: It seems that this weapon is damaged. You must find someone who can fix it. [Keep the weapon in the active slot, not in the cargo hold.]

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_SHOTGUN_SCATTER
weaponBlueprint.title: Burst Scatter Flak Cannon
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires a blast of debris across a wide area, doing up to 6 damage. Superb at taking down shields but hard to aim and can only do hull damage.

weaponBlueprint.name: SHTURM_FLAK
weaponBlueprint.title: Assault Flak Cannon
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires a blast of debris across a wide area, doing up to 5 damage, with increased crew damage. Superb at taking down shields but hard to aim.

weaponBlueprint.name: CHARGEGUN_SHOTGUN
weaponBlueprint.title: Charging Flak Cannon
weaponBlueprint.desc: This charging flak weapon can inflict up to 8 damage when fully charged.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_PLASMA_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Plasma Thrower Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires a small cluster of superheated plasma. The plasma rounds don't deal damage but are likely to start fires and pierce one shield bubble.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_PLASMA_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Plasma Thrower Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires a medium cluster of superheated plasma. The plasma rounds don't deal damage but are likely to start fires and pierce one shield bubble.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_PLASMA_3
weaponBlueprint.title: Plasma Thrower Mark III
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires a large cluster of superheated plasma. The plasma rounds don't deal damage but are likely to start fires and pierce one shield bubble.

weaponBlueprint.name: IMITATION_COMPLEX_PLAYER
weaponBlueprint.title: System Imitation Complex
weaponBlueprint.desc: Though this weapon can only stun crew, it's fast and bypasses all shield bubbles.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_STUNGUN_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Stunner Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: This experimental field generator ignores shields and may stun a large group of enemies.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_STUNGUN_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Stunner Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: This advanced field generator ignores shields and may stun the entire crew of the enemy ship.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_STUNGUN_3
weaponBlueprint.title: Stunner Mark III
weaponBlueprint.desc: This advanced field generator ignores shields and may stun the entire crew of the enemy ship. Can keep enemy crew locked in stun thanks to its fast cooldown.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_CRYSTAL_LIGHT_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Light Crystal Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: This modified weapon fires anti-personnel crystals that pierce 3 shield layers. Can be shot down by basic defense drones.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_CRYSTAL_LIGHT_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Light Crystal Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: This modified weapon fires anti-personnel crystals that pierce 3 shield layers. Can be shot down by basic defense drones. Fires one more shot than its predecessor.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_CRYSTAL_HEAVY_LOCKDOWN_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Crystal Lockdown Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires a shield piercing crystal that creates an impassable barrier. Can be shot down by basic defense drones.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_CRYSTAL_HEAVY_LOCKDOWN_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Crystal Lockdown Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires a heavy shield piercing stun-crystal that creates an impassable barrier. Can be shot down by basic defense drones.

weaponBlueprint.name: CRYSTAL_BURST_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Crystal Burst Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: This modified projectile weapon fires two crystals that each pierce one shield bubble.

weaponBlueprint.name: CRYSTAL_BURST_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Crystal Burst Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: This modified projectile weapon fires three crystals that each pierce one shield bubble. Fires one more shot than its predecessor.

weaponBlueprint.name: CRYSTAL_HEAVY_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Crystal Heavy Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: This modified projectile weapon fires one large shield-piercing crystal. Can be shot down by basic defense drones.

weaponBlueprint.name: CRYSTAL_HEAVY_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Crystal Heavy Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: This modified projectile weapon fires one large shield-piercing breaching crystal. Can be shot down by basic defense drones. Does twice as much damage than its predecessor.

weaponBlueprint.name: CRYSTAL_FLAK_I
weaponBlueprint.title: Crystal Flak Cannon
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires a blast of three crystalline shards across a random area. The shards pierce all shields, going straight through ships, freezing and breaching any room they hit on their way out.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_CRYSTAL_VULKAN
weaponBlueprint.title: Crystal Chain Vulcan
weaponBlueprint.desc: Gatling and crystal tech melded together form this crystal weapon that decreases in cooldown each time it fires, eventually being able fire very quickly.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_LASER_AUTO_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Auto-Laser Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fast-charging support laser, designed to keep enemy ships under constant fire.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_LASER_AUTO_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Auto-Laser Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: Very fast-charging support laser, designed to keep enemy ships under constant fire.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_LASER_AUTO_3
weaponBlueprint.title: Auto-Laser Mark III
weaponBlueprint.desc: Extremely fast-charging support laser designed to keep enemy ships under constant fire. Only spooled-up vulcans can fire faster.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_SCATTERCHAIN
weaponBlueprint.title: Chain Scatter Laser
weaponBlueprint.desc: Reduces in cooldown each time it fires. Doesn't damage systems and crew though.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_LASER_BURST_SCATTER_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Burst Scatter Laser Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: Burst scatter lasers fire explosive shells, good for knocking down shields for other weaponry.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_LASER_BURST_SCATTER_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Burst Scatter Laser Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: Powerful burst scatter laser that fires quite a good volley of shells, good for knocking down shields for other weaponry.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_LASER_BURST_SCATTER_3
weaponBlueprint.title: Burst Scatter Laser Mark III
weaponBlueprint.desc: Powerful burst scatter laser that fires quite the volley of shells, great for knocking down shields for other weaponry.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_LASER_HEAVY_SCATTER_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Heavy Scatter Laser Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: The heavy scatter laser does a good chunk of damage to the enemy ship's hull, but less to systems and crew.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_LASER_HEAVY_SCATTER_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Heavy Scatter Laser Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: The heavy scatter laser does a good chunk of damage to the enemy ship's hull, but less to systems and crew. Does more damage than its predecessor.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_LASER_ARTILLERY_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Artillery Laser Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: Artillery lasers are more destructive than heavy lasers and can pierce through one shield bubble.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_LASER_ARTILLERY_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Artillery Laser Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: Artillery lasers are more destructive than heavy lasers and can pierce through one shield bubble. More destructive than its predecessor.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_LASER_HULLCRUSHER
weaponBlueprint.title: Hull Crusher Laser Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: This artillery laser does double damage to systemless rooms.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_LASER_HULLCRUSHER_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Hull Crusher Laser Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: This artillery laser does double damage to systemless rooms. Faster and more breach-capable than its predecessor.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_LASER_HULLCRUSHER_3
weaponBlueprint.title: Hull Crusher Laser Mark III
weaponBlueprint.desc: This artillery laser does double damage to systemless rooms. Faster and more breach-capable than its predecessor.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_LASER_HULL_SMALL
weaponBlueprint.title: Hull Laser Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: This fast-charging laser inflicts double damage to systemless rooms.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_HULL_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Hull Laser Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: This burst-fire laser was bolstered with the ability to inflict double damage to systemless rooms.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_HULL_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Hull Laser Mark III
weaponBlueprint.desc: This enhanced version of its predecessor produces more shots at once, but also takes longer to charge.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_HULLCHAIN
weaponBlueprint.title: Chain Hull Laser
weaponBlueprint.desc: Reduces in cooldown each time it fires. Deals double damage to systemless rooms.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_IMP_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Energetic Laser Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: This analogue burst laser fires 2 projectiles at high velocities.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_IMP_3
weaponBlueprint.title: Energetic Laser Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: This analogue burst laser fires 3 projectiles at high velocities.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_LASER_ADDFIRE
weaponBlueprint.title: Combination Laser
weaponBlueprint.desc: Designed by Order fanatics, this variation of the standard laser boasts a high chance to start fires and breach.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_HEAVY_CUMULATIVE
weaponBlueprint.title: Heavy Combination Laser
weaponBlueprint.desc: Designed by Order fanatics, this variation of the heavy laser boasts a high chance to start fires and breach.

weaponBlueprint.name: GAUSS_ORDEN_MOD1
weaponBlueprint.title: Tesla Cannon Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: An invention by Order engineers, the Tesla Cannon pierces two shields, dealing only hull damage.

weaponBlueprint.name: GAUSS_ORDEN_MOD2
weaponBlueprint.title: Tesla Cannon Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: An invention by Order engineers, the Tesla Cannon pierces two shields, dealing only hull damage.

weaponBlueprint.name: GAUSS_ORDEN_PP
weaponBlueprint.title: Anti-Personnel Tesla Cannon
weaponBlueprint.desc: Order Tesla Cannon. The projectile inflicts colossal damage to living targets. Pierces two shield bubbles.

weaponBlueprint.name: GAUSS_MIXER_M1
weaponBlueprint.title: Gauss Rifle Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires one heavy high-velocity projectile which pierces one shield and can cause a variety of effects.

weaponBlueprint.name: GAUSS_MIXER_M2
weaponBlueprint.title: Gauss Rifle Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires one heavy high-velocity projectile which pierces one shield and can cause a variety of effects. Better chance of effects than its predecessor.

weaponBlueprint.name: GAUSS_MIXER_M3
weaponBlueprint.title: Gauss Rifle Mark III
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires one extra heavy high-velocity projectile which pierces one shield and can cause a variety of effects. Better chance of effects and deals more damage than its predecessor.

weaponBlueprint.name: EP_BA_BEAM_BARDICHE
weaponBlueprint.title: Bordiche Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: Although not nearly as long as the Pike Beam, this beam weapon's still capable of striking several rooms. Requires 30 missiles in the hold to function.

weaponBlueprint.name: EP_BA_BEAM_BO
weaponBlueprint.title: Ba Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: Long particle beam that damages systems and crew and stuns them too, without damaging hull. Requires 30 missiles in the hold to function.

weaponBlueprint.name: EP_BA_BEAM_SCYTHE
weaponBlueprint.title: Scothe Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: Re-purposed industrial beam with extreme range. Not meant for combat duty, it's somewhat cumbersome to use in battle. Requires 30 missiles in the hold to function.

weaponBlueprint.name: EP_BA_BEAM_HASTA
weaponBlueprint.title: Hosta Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: This compact beam weapon is slightly shorter than its successor, the Mini Beam. Requires 30 missiles in the hold to function.

weaponBlueprint.name: EP_BA_BEAM_NAGINATA
weaponBlueprint.title: Noginata Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: An advanced beam weapon that can cut a ship right in half. As powerful as the Halberd yet as long as the Pike. Requires 30 missiles in the hold to function.

weaponBlueprint.name: EP_BA_BEAM_FLAIL_DAMAGE
weaponBlueprint.title: Fleel Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fully militarized mining beam with extreme range. Deals twice as much damage as its predecessor, the Scythe. Requires 30 missiles in the hold to function.

weaponBlueprint.name: EP_BA_BEAM_SHEST
weaponBlueprint.title: Stoff Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: Advanced particle beam that damages systems and crew and stuns them too, without damaging hull. Requires 30 missiles in the hold to function.

weaponBlueprint.name: EP_BA_BEAM_K1
weaponBlueprint.title: Derk Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: This beam weapon can only deal hull damage, but is fast and power-efficient. Requires 30 missiles in the hold to function.

weaponBlueprint.name: EP_BA_BEAM_K2
weaponBlueprint.title: Stilotto Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: This heavy beam weapon can only deal hull damage, but is fast and power-efficient. Requires 30 missiles in the hold to function.

weaponBlueprint.name: EP_BEAM_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Holberd Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: Slow but reliably powerful standard beam weapon. Requires 30 missiles in the hold to function.

weaponBlueprint.name: EP_BEAM_3
weaponBlueprint.title: Gleeve Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: One of the most powerful weapons of war ever created. Known to take out some ships in a single blast. Requires 30 missiles in the hold to function.

weaponBlueprint.name: EP_BEAM_BIOFIRE
weaponBlueprint.title: Flemberge Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: This advanced weapon combines the properties of fire and anti-bio beams. Requires 30 missiles in the hold to function.

weaponBlueprint.name: EP_BEAM_FAUCHARD
weaponBlueprint.title: Feychard Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: This heavy modification of the Hull Beam can pierce one shield bubble and does twice as much damage. Requires 30 missiles in the hold to function.

weaponBlueprint.name: EP_BEAM_GUISARME
weaponBlueprint.title: Goisarme Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: Can cut straight across entire ships, assuming there's no shield to stop it. This modified Pike Beam inflicts extra crew damage. Requires 30 missiles in the hold to function.

weaponBlueprint.name: EP_BEAM_LONG
weaponBlueprint.title: Peke Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: Can cut straight across entire ships, assuming there's no shield to stop it. Requires 30 missiles in the hold to function.

weaponBlueprint.name: EP_BEAM_SP_KATANA
weaponBlueprint.title: Ketana Pierce Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: Concentrated beam weapon able to pierce two shield bubbles. Requires 30 missiles in the hold to function.

weaponBlueprint.name: EP_BEAM_SP_DAITO
weaponBlueprint.title: Techi Pierce Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: Concentrated beam weapon able to pierce one shield bubble. Requires 30 missiles in the hold to function.

weaponBlueprint.name: BEAM_DEEP_MINE
weaponBlueprint.title: Chain Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: Miners are particularly fond of this beam weapon for its quick recharge time, but it needs time to warm up.

weaponBlueprint.name: BEAM_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Mini-Beam Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: Slowly firing weak yet versatile beam weapon.

weaponBlueprint.name: BEAM_1_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Mini-Beam Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: Weak yet versatile beam weapon. Better stats than its predecessor.

weaponBlueprint.name: BEAM_LONG
weaponBlueprint.title: Pike Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: Can cut straight across entire ships, assuming there's no shield to stop it.

weaponBlueprint.name: BEAM_GUISARME
weaponBlueprint.title: Guisarme Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: Can cut straight across entire ships, assuming there's no shield to stop it. This modified Pike Beam inflicts extra crew damage.

weaponBlueprint.name: BEAM_LONG_SYS
weaponBlueprint.title: Spetum Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: Can cut straight across entire ships, assuming there's no shield to stop it. This modified Pike Beam inflicts extra system damage.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BEAM_NAGINATA
weaponBlueprint.title: Naginata Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: An advanced beam weapon that can cut a ship right in half. As powerful as the Halberd yet as long as the Pike.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BEAM_BATON
weaponBlueprint.title: Baton Particle Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: Simple particle beam that damages systems and crew and stuns them too, without damaging hull.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BEAM_BO
weaponBlueprint.title: Bo Particle Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: Long particle beam that damages systems and crew and stuns them too, without damaging hull.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BEAM_SHEST
weaponBlueprint.title: Staff Particle Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: Advanced particle beam that damages systems and crew and stuns them too, without damaging hull.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BEAM_SMASHER
weaponBlueprint.title: Mace Particle Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: Powerful particle beam that damages systems and crew and stuns them too, without damaging hull.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BEAM_K1
weaponBlueprint.title: Dirk Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: This beam weapon can only deal hull damage, but is fast and power-efficient.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BEAM_K2
weaponBlueprint.title: Stiletto Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: This heavy beam weapon can only deal hull damage, but is fast and power-efficient.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BEAM_HASTA
weaponBlueprint.title: Hasta Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: This compact beam weapon is slightly shorter than its successor, the Mini Beam.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BEAM_BARDICHE
weaponBlueprint.title: Bardiche Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: Although not nearly as long as the Pike Beam, this beam weapon's still capable of striking several rooms.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BEAM_HULL_MINI
weaponBlueprint.title: Mini Hull Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: This enhanced beam weapon does double damage when crossing through empty sections of the hull. However, its span is very short.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BEAM_HULL_SMALL
weaponBlueprint.title: Hull Beam Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: This enhanced beam weapon does double damage when crossing through empty sections of the hull.

weaponBlueprint.name: BEAM_HULL
weaponBlueprint.title: Hull Beam Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: This enhanced beam weapon does double damage when crossing through empty sections of the hull. Twice as long as its predecessor, but slightly slower.

weaponBlueprint.name: BEAM_FAUCHARD
weaponBlueprint.title: Fauchard Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: This heavy modification of the Hull Beam can pierce one shield bubble and does twice as much damage.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BEAM_AUTO
weaponBlueprint.title: Auto Point Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: This rapid support beam is designed to keep enemy ships under fire.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BEAM_ADAPTIVE_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Adaptive Point Beam Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: This latest weapons system adapts to enemy shields, increasing damage by 0.25 each time it fires up to a max of 2.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BEAM_ADAPTIVE_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Adaptive Point Beam Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: This advanced weapon system adapts to enemy shields, increasing damage by 0.5 each time it fires up to a max of 3.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BEAM_ADAPTIVE_3
weaponBlueprint.title: Adaptive Point Beam Mark III
weaponBlueprint.desc: This advanced weapons system adapts to enemy shields, increasing damage by 1 each time it fires up to a max of 4.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BEAM_SCYTHE
weaponBlueprint.title: Scythe Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: Re-purposed industrial beam with extreme range. Not meant for combat duty, it's somewhat cumbersome to use in battle.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BEAM_FLAIL_DAMAGE
weaponBlueprint.title: Flail Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fully militarized mining beam with extreme range. Deals twice as much damage as its predecessor, the Scythe.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BEAM_PERNACH
weaponBlueprint.title: Pernach Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: Quick yet powerful point beam weapon.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BEAM_MAUL
weaponBlueprint.title: Maul Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: Strong point beam weapon that can pierce straight through ships.

weaponBlueprint.name: BEAM_FIRE
weaponBlueprint.title: Fire Beam Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: This terrifying beam does no physical damage but ignites fires.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BEAM_FIRE_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Fire Beam Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: This hellish beam ignites fires and damages crew.

weaponBlueprint.name: BEAM_FIRECHAIN
weaponBlueprint.title: Chain Fire Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: Chain ignition beam. Shorter than the conventional model, but gets faster each time it fires.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BEAM_FIRE_FOCUS
weaponBlueprint.title: Fire Pierce Beam Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: Dangerous short beam weapon that ignores shields and starts fires.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BEAM_FIRE_FOCUS2
weaponBlueprint.title: Fire Pierce Beam Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: Dangerous short beam weapon that ignores shields and starts fires. Slightly longer and recharges faster than its predecessor, but fires a bit slower.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BEAM_BIO_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Anti-Bio Beam Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: This fast bio-weapon does no physical damage but instead tears through crew.

weaponBlueprint.name: BEAM_BIO
weaponBlueprint.title: Anti-Bio Beam Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: This terrifying beam does no physical damage but rips through organic material, dealing heavy damage to crewmembers.

weaponBlueprint.name: BEAM_CHAIN_BIO
weaponBlueprint.title: Chain Anti-Bio Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: This beam was specifically designed for capturing ships. Decreases in cooldown each time it fires.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BEAM_BIO_FOCUS
weaponBlueprint.title: Focus Anti-Bio Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: This terrifying all shield-piercing beam does no physical damage but rips through organic material, dealing serious damage to one target.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BEAM_BIO_SP1
weaponBlueprint.title: Chris Anti-Bio Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: This bio-weapon doesn't damage ships in any way but instead tears apart organic material through one shield bubble (despite the stated technical characteristics).

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BEAM_BIO_SP2
weaponBlueprint.title: Kukri Anti-Bio Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: This bio-weapon doesn't damage ships in any way but instead rips apart organic material through one shield bubble (despite the stated technical characteristics).

weaponBlueprint.name: BEAM_3
weaponBlueprint.title: Glaive Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: One of the most powerful weapons of war ever created. Known to take out some ships in a single blast.

weaponBlueprint.name: BEAM_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Halberd Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: Slow but reliably powerful standard beam weapon.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BEAM_POLLAXE
weaponBlueprint.title: Pollaxe Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: This analogue of the Halberd Beam requires less power, but dealing reduced damage through shields is impossible.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BEAM_PARTISAN
weaponBlueprint.title: Partisan Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: This analogue of the Glaive Beam requires less power, but dealing reduced damage through shields is impossible.

weaponBlueprint.name: BEAM_SP_DAITO
weaponBlueprint.title: Tachi Pierce Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: Concentrated beam weapon able to pierce one shield bubble.

weaponBlueprint.name: BEAM_SP_KATANA
weaponBlueprint.title: Katana Pierce Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: Concentrated beam weapon able to pierce two shield bubbles.

weaponBlueprint.name: BEAM_BIOFIRE
weaponBlueprint.title: Flamberge Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: This advanced weapon combines the properties of fire and anti-bio beams.

weaponBlueprint.name: BEAM_SCALPEL
weaponBlueprint.title: Scalpel Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: This point particle beam has a small chance to ignite the targeted room.

weaponBlueprint.name: FIRE_HELL_BEAM
weaponBlueprint.title: Hellfire Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: Hellfire Beam has such a high temperature that it leaves behind fires in its wake.

weaponBlueprint.name: BEAM_FIRE_SARISSA
weaponBlueprint.title: Sarissa Beam
weaponBlueprint.desc: The powerful standard beam weapon of the Order of Chaos.

weaponBlueprint.name: BOMB_LOCK
weaponBlueprint.title: Lockdown Bomb Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: Self-teleporting explosive that creates a dense wall preventing movement in or out of the room, damaging and stunning crew.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BOMB_LOCK_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Lockdown Bomb Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: Self-teleporting explosive that breaches in a dense wall preventing movement in or out of the room, damaging and stunning crew.

weaponBlueprint.name: BOMB_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Small Bomb
weaponBlueprint.desc: Self-teleporting explosive that damages systems and crew but not the hull.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BOMB_BIG
weaponBlueprint.title: Big Bomb
weaponBlueprint.desc: Recharges and deploys slower than its smaller counterpart, the Small Bomb, but does more damage.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BOMB_TIMER
weaponBlueprint.title: Timer Bomb
weaponBlueprint.desc: Universal bomb with a timer. Inflicts massive crew damage and may set fires or cause a breach in the targeted room. Impressive!

weaponBlueprint.name: BOMB_HEALFIRE
weaponBlueprint.title: Healing Fire Bomb
weaponBlueprint.desc: Self-teleporting healing unit that instantly heals all friendly crew in the room, with a high chance to start a fire.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BOMB_CLUSTER_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Cluster Bomb
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires a cluster of 3 self-teleporting explosives designed to damage systems and crew, but not hull.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BOMB_FIRE_SMALL
weaponBlueprint.title: Fire Bomb Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: Self-teleporting explosive designed to damage crew-members and light fires.

weaponBlueprint.name: BOMB_FIRE
weaponBlueprint.title: Fire Bomb Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: Self-teleporting explosive designed to damage crew-members and light fires. Deals more crew damage than its predecessor.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BOMB_FIRE_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Fire Bomb Mark III
weaponBlueprint.desc: Self-teleporting explosive designed to damage crew-members and light fires. Deals more damage to systems and crew than its predecessor.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BOMB_CLUSTER_FIRE
weaponBlueprint.title: Cluster Fire Bomb
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires a cluster of 3 self-teleporting bombs, which damage crew and can start fires.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BOMB_BIO
weaponBlueprint.title: Biological Bomb
weaponBlueprint.desc: Self-teleporting explosive that doesn't do any hull damage but instead destroys organic matter, dealing heavy damage to crew.

weaponBlueprint.name: BOMB_HEAL
weaponBlueprint.title: Healing Burst
weaponBlueprint.desc: Self-teleporting healing unit that instantly heals all friendly crew in the targeted room.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BOMB_HEAL_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Cluster Healing Burst
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires a cluster of 3 self-teleporting healing units that instantly heal friendly crew. Can target your own ship but then only one unit will be fired.

weaponBlueprint.name: BOMB_BREACH_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Breach Bomb Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: Self-teleporting explosive designed to damage systems and cause a breach.

weaponBlueprint.name: BOMB_BREACH_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Breach Bomb Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: Self-teleporting explosive designed to damage systems and cause a breach. Deals more damage to systems and crew than its predecessor.

weaponBlueprint.name: BOMB_BREACH_3
weaponBlueprint.title: Breach Bomb Mark III
weaponBlueprint.desc: Self-teleporting breaching explosive designed to damage systems. Deals more damage to systems and crew than its predecessor.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BOMB_CLUSTER_BREACH
weaponBlueprint.title: Cluster Breach Bomb
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires a cluster of 3 self-teleporting explosives designed to damage systems and cause breaches.

weaponBlueprint.name: BOMB_STUN
weaponBlueprint.title: Stun Bomb
weaponBlueprint.desc: Self-teleporting explosive that does 1 ion damage and damages and stuns all crew inside the room.

weaponBlueprint.name: BOMB_ION
weaponBlueprint.title: Ion Bomb
weaponBlueprint.desc: Self-teleporting explosive that uses ion damage to disable systems.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BOMB_CLUSTER_ION
weaponBlueprint.title: Cluster Ion Bomb
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires a cluster of 3 self-teleporting explosives that use ion damage to disable systems.

weaponBlueprint.name: BOMB_HEAL_SYSTEM
weaponBlueprint.title: Repair Burst
weaponBlueprint.desc: Self-teleporting unit that floods a room with nano-bots capable of completely repairing all system damage.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BOMB_NANO_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Hull Repair Burst Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: Self-teleporting unit that repairs 1 damage to the hull and the targeted system. Used on your own ship and requires 2 missiles per use.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BOMB_NANO_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Hull Repair Burst Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: Self-teleporting unit that repairs 2 damage to the hull and the targeted system. Used on your own ship and requires 2 missiles per use.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BOMB_NANO_3
weaponBlueprint.title: Hull Repair Burst Mark III
weaponBlueprint.desc: Self-teleporting unit that repairs 3 hull damage. Used on your own ship and requires 2 missiles per use.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BOMB_NANO_X
weaponBlueprint.title: Nano-Regenerator
weaponBlueprint.desc: Nano-Teleports a block of repair nanites, which repair hull damage. Requires 10 missile warheads to activate.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BOMB_CLUSTER_STUN
weaponBlueprint.title: Flashbang Cluster Bomb I
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires 3 self-teleporting explosives designed to damage crew and stun them for 10 seconds.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BOMB_CLUSTER_STUN2
weaponBlueprint.title: Flashbang Cluster Bomb II
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires 3 self-teleporting explosives designed to damage crew and stun them for 15 seconds.

weaponBlueprint.name: TAHION_M1
weaponBlueprint.title: Tachyon Generator Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: Generates a cluster of particles constantly in flux with time, making any attempts at intercepting the cluster futile, including shields.

weaponBlueprint.name: TAHION_M2
weaponBlueprint.title: Tachyon Generator Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: Generates a cluster of particles constantly in flux with time, making any attempts at intercepting the cluster futile, including shields. Better effect chances and recharges faster than its predecessor.

weaponBlueprint.name: TAHION_M3
weaponBlueprint.title: Heavy Tachyon Generator
weaponBlueprint.desc: Generates a cluster of particles constantly in flux with time, making any attempts at intercepting the cluster futile, including shields. Does more damage than its predecessor, albeit at the cost of handling.

weaponBlueprint.name: MISSILES_ARU_GOLIAPH
weaponBlueprint.title: AMP Goliath
weaponBlueprint.desc: This missile platform increases in damage the more it fires.

weaponBlueprint.name: MISSILES_HYDRA
weaponBlueprint.title: Hydra Missiles
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires a blast of mini-missiles across a random area doing up to 5 damage. Good at bypassing defenses but hard to aim.

weaponBlueprint.name: MISSILES_MEGA
weaponBlueprint.title: Zeus Missiles
weaponBlueprint.desc: This powerful launcher was specially designed for use in heavy cruisers and dreadnoughts.

weaponBlueprint.name: MISSILES_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Leto Missiles
weaponBlueprint.desc: This weak and outdated launcher is still able to be useful. As basic as missiles get.

weaponBlueprint.name: MISSILES_2_PLAYER
weaponBlueprint.title: Artemis Missiles
weaponBlueprint.desc: The standard missile launcher on most Federation ships. Packs a greater punch than its little brother, the Leto.

weaponBlueprint.name: MISSILES_3
weaponBlueprint.title: Hermes Missiles
weaponBlueprint.desc: Standard but powerful missiles. The older brother of the Artemis and Leto.

weaponBlueprint.name: MISSILES_BURST
weaponBlueprint.title: Pegasus Missiles
weaponBlueprint.desc: Creative missile design allows for two projectiles for the cost of one!

weaponBlueprint.name: MISSILES_BREACH
weaponBlueprint.title: Breach Missiles
weaponBlueprint.desc: These missiles are designed in such a way so as to cause maximum damage to ship plating.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_MISSILE_CHARGEGUN_SMALL
weaponBlueprint.title: Mini-Roy Missiles
weaponBlueprint.desc: If given time to prepare, the 'Mini-Roy' launcher can replicate multiple warheads.

weaponBlueprint.name: MISSILE_CHARGEGUN
weaponBlueprint.title: Roy Missiles
weaponBlueprint.desc: If given time to prepare, the 'Roy' launcher can replicate multiple warheads.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_SHOTGUN_MISSILES
weaponBlueprint.title: Missile Flak Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires a swarm of missiles across a very wide area, doing up to 6 damage. Good at bypassing defenses but very difficult to aim, making it rather ineffective against smaller ships.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_SHOTGUN_MISSILES2
weaponBlueprint.title: Missile Flak Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires a swarm of missiles across a wide area, doing up to 7 damage. Good at bypassing defenses, but hard to aim. More accurate than its predecessor.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_SHOTGUN_MISSILES3
weaponBlueprint.title: Missile Flak Mark III
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires a swarm of missiles across a random area, doing up to 8 damage. Good at bypassing defenses, but tough to aim. More accurate than its predecessor.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_MISSILES_ONI
weaponBlueprint.title: Oni Missiles
weaponBlueprint.desc: This techno-missile cloaks right past basic defense drones.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_MISSILES_IFRIT
weaponBlueprint.title: Ifrit Missiles
weaponBlueprint.desc: Ingenious design allows you to fire 4 missiles for the cost of one. These techno-missiles cloak right past basic defense drones.

weaponBlueprint.name: MISSILES_SYS1
weaponBlueprint.title: Rhea Missiles
weaponBlueprint.desc: Splits the warhead into two anti-system micro-rockets that ignore all shield bubbles.

weaponBlueprint.name: MISSILES_SYS2
weaponBlueprint.title: Cronus Missiles
weaponBlueprint.desc: Splits the warhead into three anti-system micro-rockets that ignore all shield bubbles.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_MISSILES_FOBOS
weaponBlueprint.title: Phobos Missiles
weaponBlueprint.desc: This setup launches one missile that does additional system damage.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_MISSILES_DEIMOS
weaponBlueprint.title: Deimos Missiles
weaponBlueprint.desc: This setup launches two missiles that do additional system damage.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_MISSILES_SWARM_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Ogre Missile Battery
weaponBlueprint.desc: This basic missile battery fires a low-yield swarm of missiles.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_MISSILES_SWARM_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Leviathan Missile Battery
weaponBlueprint.desc: This heavy artillery battery fires a medium-yield swarm of missiles.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_MISSILES_SWARM_3
weaponBlueprint.title: Titan Missile Battery
weaponBlueprint.desc: This gargantuan artillery battery fires a high-yield swarm of missiles.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_MISSILES_ASTERIA
weaponBlueprint.title: Asteria Missiles
weaponBlueprint.desc: The rapid-fire nature of this weak missile launcher makes it really easy to quickly use up lots of ammo.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_MISSILES_HULL_SMALL
weaponBlueprint.title: Hull Missiles Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: Deals minor damage with a not bad breach chance.

weaponBlueprint.name: MISSILES_HULL
weaponBlueprint.title: Hull Missiles Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: Deals good hull damage with a pretty decent breach chance.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_MISSILES_4
weaponBlueprint.title: Ares Missiles
weaponBlueprint.desc: Powerful missile designed for drilling operations but adapted for use in combat.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_MISSILES_PERYTON
weaponBlueprint.title: Peryton Missiles
weaponBlueprint.desc: Elegant but outdated missile design allows production of two missiles for the price of one.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_MISSILES_COCKATRICE
weaponBlueprint.title: Basilisk Missiles
weaponBlueprint.desc: Innovative design allows production of three missiles for the price of one.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_MISSILES_FIRE
weaponBlueprint.title: Inferno Missiles
weaponBlueprint.desc: These missiles are designed to inflict maximum damage with fire.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_MISSILES_SIMURGH
weaponBlueprint.title: Simurgh Missiles
weaponBlueprint.desc: Clever missile battery design allows production of four missiles for the price of one.

weaponBlueprint.name: ORDEN2_MISSILES
weaponBlueprint.title: Lilith Missiles
weaponBlueprint.desc: Order of Chaos missile launcher that fires two missiles filled with flammable liquid.

weaponBlueprint.name: ORDEN3_MISSILES
weaponBlueprint.title: Cerberus Missiles
weaponBlueprint.desc: Order of Chaos missile launcher that fires three missiles filled with flammable liquid.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_MINES_BIG
weaponBlueprint.title: Khadur Mine Launcher
weaponBlueprint.desc: Launches one high-yield mine.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_MINES_MEDIUM
weaponBlueprint.title: Frigg Mine Launcher
weaponBlueprint.desc: Launches one medium-yield mine.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_MINES_SMALL
weaponBlueprint.title: Oya Mine Launcher
weaponBlueprint.desc: Launches two low-yield mines.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_MINES_TECH
weaponBlueprint.title: Baal Mine Launcher
weaponBlueprint.desc: Launches a cloaked mine that bypasses basic defense drones.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_MINE_ION
weaponBlueprint.title: Ion Mine Launcher
weaponBlueprint.desc: Launches a phasing ion mine that deals a good amount of ion damage in addition to hull damage.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_MINES_MEDIUM_M3
weaponBlueprint.title: Glyne Charge Mine Launcher
weaponBlueprint.desc: If given time to prepare, the 'Glyne' mine launcher can replicate multiple warheads. Each mine deals 2 hull damage.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_MINES_MEDIUM_M2
weaponBlueprint.title: Glaan Charge Mine Launcher
weaponBlueprint.desc: If given time to prepare, the 'Glaan' mine launcher can replicate an additional warhead. Each mine deals 2 hull damage.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_MISSILES_CHAFFLAUNCHER
weaponBlueprint.title: Chaff Launcher
weaponBlueprint.desc: Support weapon that fires lots of missile fragments designed to jam defense drone radar.

weaponBlueprint.name: MISSILES_KARAKURT
weaponBlueprint.title: Karakurt Missiles
weaponBlueprint.desc: Order of Chaos missile launcher designed to ignite enemy systems.

weaponBlueprint.name: MISSILES_V3
weaponBlueprint.title: Phoenix Missiles
weaponBlueprint.desc: Order of Chaos missile launcher. Fills its ammo with flammable liquids then sets a delayed fuse to guarantee fires.

weaponBlueprint.title: Lilith Missiles*
weaponBlueprint.desc: Order of Chaos missile launcher that fires two missiles filled with flammable liquid. This duplicated version of the original doesn't require ammo.

weaponBlueprint.title: Zeus Missiles*
weaponBlueprint.desc: This powerful launcher was specially designed for use in heavy cruisers and dreadnoughts. This duplicated version of the original doesn't require ammo.

weaponBlueprint.name: MISSILES_ARU_GOLIAPH_M
weaponBlueprint.title: AMP Goliath*
weaponBlueprint.desc: This missile platform increases in damage the more it fires.

weaponBlueprint.name: MISSILES_HYDRA_M
weaponBlueprint.title: Hydra Missiles*
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires a blast of mini-missiles across a random area doing up to 5 damage. Good at bypassing defenses but hard to aim. This duplicated version of the original doesn't require ammo.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_ION_HVBURST_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Zolton Ion Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: This modified burst ion weapon fires twice for multiple chances to damage and disable systems.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_ION_HVBURST_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Zolton Ion Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: This upgraded burst ion weapon fires three times for multiple chances to damage and disable systems.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_ION_HVBURST_3
weaponBlueprint.title: Zolton Ion Mark III
weaponBlueprint.desc: This powerful burst ion weapon fires four times, able to permanently disable ship systems.

weaponBlueprint.name: ION_CHARGEGUN
weaponBlueprint.title: Ion Battery Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: This ion weapon can charge 3 times, giving it additional projectiles.

weaponBlueprint.name: ION_CHARGEGUN_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Ion Battery Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: This ion weapon can charge 4 times, giving it additional projectiles.

weaponBlueprint.name: ION_CHAINGUN
weaponBlueprint.title: Adaptive Ion
weaponBlueprint.desc: This weapon's ion damage increases each time it fires to a max of 4.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_ION_VULKAN
weaponBlueprint.title: Ion Chain Vulcan
weaponBlueprint.desc: Powerful ion cannon that constantly disables enemy systems.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_SHOTGUN_ION_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Ion Flak Cannon Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires a blast of ionized debris across a random area, doing up to 2 ion damage. Good at taking down shields but hard to aim.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_SHOTGUN_ION_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Ion Flak Cannon Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires a blast of ionized debris across a random area, doing up to 3 ion damage. Superb at taking down shields but hard to aim.

weaponBlueprint.name: ION_STUN
weaponBlueprint.title: Ion Stunner
weaponBlueprint.desc: Ion weapons can disable systems without causing hull damage. This ion weapon stuns crew inside the room for 5 seconds.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_ION_2_STUN
weaponBlueprint.title: Heavy Ion Stunner
weaponBlueprint.desc: Ion weapons can disable systems without causing hull damage. This ion weapon stuns crew inside the room for 10 seconds.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_ION_BURST_1_STUN
weaponBlueprint.title: Burst Ion Stunner
weaponBlueprint.desc: Ion weapons can disable systems without causing hull damage. This ion weapon fires twice, stunning crew inside the room for 5 seconds.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_ION_PIERCE_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Phase Ion Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: Ion phase weapons pierce and ionize shields as well as the targeted systems.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_ION_PIERCE_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Phase Ion Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: Ion phase weapons pierce and ionize shields as well as the targeted systems. Fires faster than the Mark I.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_EFFECTOR_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Effector Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: Ion emitter that generates ion fields, disabling systems.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_EFFECTOR_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Effector Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fast ion emitter that quickly generates ion fields, disabling systems.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_EFFECTOR_3
weaponBlueprint.title: Heavy Effector
weaponBlueprint.desc: Slow but powerful ion emitter that generates large ion fields, disabling systems for a long time.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_EFFECTOR_ADAPTIVE
weaponBlueprint.title: Adaptive Effector
weaponBlueprint.desc: Intelligent ion emitter that quickly adapts to enemy systems by increasing its ion damage by 1 after every pulse, up to max of 3.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_ION_BURST_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Burst Ion Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires twice for multiple chances to disable systems without causing hull damage.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_ION_BURST_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Burst Ion Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires three times for multiple chances to disable systems without causing hull damage.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_ION_BURST_3
weaponBlueprint.title: Burst Ion Mark III
weaponBlueprint.desc: This powerful ion cannon fires four times, able to disable enemy systems for a long time.

weaponBlueprint.name: ION_HEAVY_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Heavy Ion Cannon Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: This ion weapon can disable systems without causing hull damage.

weaponBlueprint.name: ION_HEAVY_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Heavy Ion Cannon Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: This powerful ion weapon can disable and damage systems without causing hull damage.

weaponBlueprint.name: ION_HEAVY_3
weaponBlueprint.title: Heavy Ion Cannon Mark III
weaponBlueprint.desc: This massive but slow ion weapon can disable and damage systems without causing hull damage.

weaponBlueprint.name: ION_HEAVY_FIRE_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Heavy Fire Ion Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: This fiery ion weapon can disable and damage systems without causing hull damage. Low chance of fire if it hits the system directly.

weaponBlueprint.name: ION_HEAVY_FIRE_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Heavy Fire Ion Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: This powerful fire ion weapon can disable and damage systems without causing hull damage. Low chance of fire if it hits the system directly.

weaponBlueprint.name: ION_HEAVY_FIRE_3
weaponBlueprint.title: Heavy Fire Ion Mark III
weaponBlueprint.desc: This massive fire ion weapon can disable and damage systems without causing hull damage. Low chance of fire if it hits the system directly.

weaponBlueprint.name: ION_BLAST_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Ion Blast Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: Ion weapons can disable systems without causing hull damage.

weaponBlueprint.name: ION_BLAST_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Ion Blast Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: Ion weapons can disable systems without causing hull damage. Recharges faster than its predecessor.

weaponBlueprint.name: ION_BLAST_3
weaponBlueprint.title: Ion Blast Mark III
weaponBlueprint.desc: Ion weapons can disable the systems without causing hull damage. Recharges faster than its predecessor.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_ION_CHAIN_MINI
weaponBlueprint.title: Chain Ion
weaponBlueprint.desc: Ion weapons can disable systems without causing hull damage. After 3 volleys it takes just 4 seconds to fire, as fast as the Ion Blast Mark III.

weaponBlueprint.name: ION_BLAST_FIRE_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Fire Ion Blast Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fire ion weapons can start fires if their blasts directly hit the target room.

weaponBlueprint.name: ION_BLAST_FIRE_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Fire Ion Blast Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fire ion weapons can start fires if their blasts directly hit the target room. Recharges faster than its predecessor.

weaponBlueprint.name: ION_BLAST_FIRE_3
weaponBlueprint.title: Fire Ion Blast Mark III
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fire ion weapons can start fires if their blasts directly hit the target room. Recharges faster than its predecessor.

weaponBlueprint.name: MESON_CANNON
weaponBlueprint.title: Meson Particle Cannon
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires a cluster of mesons which pass straight through shields, ionizing them and the target system. May start a fire.

weaponBlueprint.name: IMITATION_COMPLEX
weaponBlueprint.title: System-Imitating complex
weaponBlueprint.desc: Disrupts the display of systems on the enemy ship. Also briefly stuns crew in the targeted room.

weaponBlueprint.name: MISSILES_PIRATE_BIGBIG
weaponBlueprint.title: Very Big Missile
weaponBlueprint.desc: This missile launcher requires 10 ammunition per volley.

weaponBlueprint.name: MISSILES_MEGA_SPECIAL
weaponBlueprint.title: Zeus Missiles S
weaponBlueprint.desc: This powerful launcher specially designed for use in heavy cruisers and dreadnoughts.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_MISSILES_SIMURGH_SPECIAL
weaponBlueprint.title: Simurgh Missiles S
weaponBlueprint.desc: The clever design of the missile battery allows you to release the 4 projectiles for the cost of one.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_MISSILES_FIRE_SPECIAL
weaponBlueprint.title: Inferno Missiles S
weaponBlueprint.desc: These missiles are designed to inflict maximum damage with fire.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_MISSILES_COCKATRICE_SPEC
weaponBlueprint.title: Basilisk Missiles S
weaponBlueprint.desc: The innovative design allows production of 3 missiles for the cost of one.

weaponBlueprint.name: PULSE_CANNON_1
weaponBlueprint.title: Pulse Blaster
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires a damaging ion stun-pulse. Recharges quickly.

weaponBlueprint.name: PULSE_CANNON_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Fire Pulse Blaster
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires a damaging ion stun-pulse. More likely to start fires.

weaponBlueprint.name: PULSE_CANNON_3
weaponBlueprint.title: Breach Pulse Blaster
weaponBlueprint.desc: Fires a damaging ion stun-pulse. More likely to cause breaches.

weaponBlueprint.name: PULSE_CANNON_1X
weaponBlueprint.title: Charge Pulse Blaster
weaponBlueprint.desc: Can store up to two damaging ion stun-pulses. Recharges quickly.

weaponBlueprint.name: PULSE_CANNON_2X
weaponBlueprint.title: Charge Fire Pulse Blaster
weaponBlueprint.desc: Can store up to two damaging ion stun-pulses. More likely to start fires.

weaponBlueprint.name: PULSE_CANNON_3X
weaponBlueprint.title: Charge Breach Pulse Blaster
weaponBlueprint.desc: Can store up to two damaging ion stun-pulses. More likely to cause breaches.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_PRISM
weaponBlueprint.title: Prismatic Laser Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: This heavy single-shot Avatar laser is able to ionize and possibly breach the targeted system.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_PRISM_2
weaponBlueprint.title: Prismatic Laser Mark II
weaponBlueprint.desc: This heavy two-shot Avatar laser is able to ionize and possibly breach the targeted system.

weaponBlueprint.name: LASER_PRISM_3
weaponBlueprint.title: Prismatic Laser Mark III
weaponBlueprint.desc: This heavy three-shot Avatar laser can ionize systems and possibly breach the targeted room.

weaponBlueprint.name: DEPRESSOR_GUN
weaponBlueprint.title: Glucogenerator
weaponBlueprint.desc: Generates all sorts of noises to confuse the player. This is supposed to be an enemy weapon, but you can confuse yourself if you want...

weaponBlueprint.name: ASTEROID_GUN
weaponBlueprint.title: Asteroid Cannon
weaponBlueprint.desc: Shoots stone fragments taken from the nearest asteroid field.

weaponBlueprint.name: JADE_CANNON
weaponBlueprint.title: Star Smasher
weaponBlueprint.desc: This advanced heavy laser is known as "The Starsmasher", named for its role in repelling the Solar Armada. No defense can withstand its blasts, which evade all defense drones and pierce all shields.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BOMB_CLUSTER_STUN_ENEMY
weaponBlueprint.title: ENEMY Flashbang Cluster Bomb I
weaponBlueprint.desc: Deploys 3 self-teleporting explosive that stuns all crew inside the targeted room.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_BOMB_CLUSTER_STUN_ENEMY2
weaponBlueprint.title: ENEMY Flashbang Cluster Bomb II
weaponBlueprint.desc: Deploys 3 self-teleporting explosive that stuns all crew inside the targeted room.

weaponBlueprint.name: OMICRON_AEGON_ROCKET_1_FRC
weaponBlueprint.title: Human Prototype Weapon ‰
weaponBlueprint.desc: Experimental missile weapon.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: Omicron Aegon Rocket. Advanced defense drone is required to neutralize it. 4 damage. 1 damage to systems. Pierces all shields. Low Breach chance. 22 s. cooldown. Requires 2 missiles. Seals targeted room.

weaponBlueprint.name: BOMB_1P_FRC
weaponBlueprint.title: Малая бомба+ ‰
weaponBlueprint.desc: Эта бомба заряжается быстрее, чем обычная. Может применяться на вашем корабле.

weaponBlueprint.title: Crystal Burst Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: Yo! Special projectile weapon that fires two shield-piercing crystal shards. Vulnerable to Defense drones.

droneBlueprint.name: DE_DRONE_DEFENSE_CRYSTAL_LIGHT
droneBlueprint.title: Crystal Defense Drone
droneBlueprint.desc: This modified defensive turret shoots light crystals at incoming enemy missiles, mines and debris. Cooldown: 250ms.

weaponBlueprint.name: BA_LIGHT_DEFENSE_DRONE_CRYSTAL
weaponBlueprint.title: Light Crystal Mark I
weaponBlueprint.desc: Yo! Modified projectile weapon that fires 3 shield piercing anti-personnel crystals. Cannot damage ships structural integrity or deplete shields.

droneBlueprint.name: DE_DRONE_DEFENSE_LIGHT_MISSILE
droneBlueprint.title: Tower Defense Drone Mark I
droneBlueprint.desc: This outdated defensive turret fires replicated missiles at incoming enemy missiles, mines and debris. Cooldown: 6 seconds.

droneBlueprint.name: DE_DRONE_DEFENSE_SWARM_MISSILE
droneBlueprint.title: Tower Defense Drone Mark II
droneBlueprint.desc: This basic defensive turret fires replicated swarm missiles at incoming enemy missiles, mines and debris. Cooldown: 4 seconds.

droneBlueprint.name: DE_DRONE_DEFENSE_LIGHT_1
droneBlueprint.title: Light Defense Drone Mark I
droneBlueprint.desc: This defensive turret fires light laser pulses at incoming enemy missiles, mines and debris. Cooldown: 3 seconds.

droneBlueprint.name: DE_DRONE_DEFENSE_LIGHT_2
droneBlueprint.title: Light Defense Drone Mark II
droneBlueprint.desc: This agile defensive turret fires light laser pulses at incoming enemy missiles, mines and debris. Cooldown: 600ms.

droneBlueprint.name: DE_DRONE_DEFENSE_SCATTER
droneBlueprint.title: Scatter Defense Drone
droneBlueprint.desc: This defensive turret excels at quickly firing scatter-shells at incoming enemy missiles, mines and debris. Cooldown: 300ms.

droneBlueprint.name: DE_DRONE_DEFENSE_MINESWEEPER
droneBlueprint.title: Ion Minesweeper Drone
droneBlueprint.desc: This defensive turret quickly fires slow ion pulses, reliable against equally slow enemy mines, but therefore unreliable against other enemy projectiles. Cooldown: 750ms.

droneBlueprint.name: DE_DRONE_DEFENSE_HEAVY_SMALL
droneBlueprint.title: Heavy Defense Drone Mark I
droneBlueprint.desc: This defensive turret fires heavy lasers at incoming projectiles of all types. Cooldown: 3 seconds.

droneBlueprint.name: DE_DRONE_DEFENSE_HEAVY
droneBlueprint.title: Heavy Defense Drone Mark II
droneBlueprint.desc: This upgraded defensive turret fires heavy lasers at incoming projectiles of all types. Cooldown: 1.5 seconds.

droneBlueprint.name: DE_DRONE_DEFENSE_GAUSS
droneBlueprint.title: Gauss Defense Drone
droneBlueprint.desc: This defensive turret uses its Gauss Rifle to fires fast projectiles at incoming projectiles of all types. Its manufacturer guarantees its accuracy. Cooldown: 1.25 seconds.

droneBlueprint.name: DE_DRONE_DEFENSE_SVCH
droneBlueprint.title: Microwave Defense Drone
droneBlueprint.desc: Randomly releases a varying number of microwave fields when a target is detected. Each microwave field drifts about upon release, potentially intercepting projectiles of all kinds and even enemy drones.

droneBlueprint.name: DRONE_CHAFF
droneBlueprint.title: Decoy Combat Drone
droneBlueprint.desc: Fast-moving combat stealth drone that distracts enemy defense drones. Sometimes it can even distract enemy weaponry...

droneBlueprint.name: DEFENSE_1_OLD
droneBlueprint.title: Defense Drone Mark I
droneBlueprint.desc: Tried and true, this defensive turret fires lasers at incoming enemy missiles, mines and debris. Cooldown: 1 second.

droneBlueprint.name: DEFENSE_2
droneBlueprint.title: Defense Drone Mark II
droneBlueprint.desc: This fast-firing defensive turret fires lasers at incoming projectiles of all types. Cooldown: 600ms.

droneBlueprint.name: DE_DRONE_DEFENSE_3
droneBlueprint.title: Defense Drone Mark III
droneBlueprint.desc: This advanced defensive turret fires lasers at incoming projectiles of all types. Fires slightly faster than its predecessor, which can make all the difference. Cooldown: 450ms.

droneBlueprint.name: BOARDER_ION
droneBlueprint.title: Ion Intruder Drone
droneBlueprint.desc: Breaks through the enemy's hull and disables random systems. Goes on to ion other systems.

droneBlueprint.name: DRONE_HACKING
droneBlueprint.title: Hacking Drone
droneBlueprint.desc: It is better to have never seen, than to have seen at all.

droneBlueprint.name: DE_DRONE_SHIELD_SMALL
droneBlueprint.title: Shield Overcharger Mark I
droneBlueprint.desc: Periodically creates a single Supershield barrier.

droneBlueprint.name: DRONE_SHIELD
droneBlueprint.title: Shield Overcharger Mark II
droneBlueprint.desc: Periodically creates a single Supershield barrier. Requires one less bar of power than its predecessor.

droneBlueprint.name: DE_DRONE_SHIELD_BIG
droneBlueprint.title: Shield Overcharger Mark III
droneBlueprint.desc: Periodically creates a single Supershield barrier. Requires one less bar of power than its predecessor.

droneBlueprint.name: DRONE_SHIELD_PLAYER
droneBlueprint.title: Shield Overcharger+
droneBlueprint.desc: Periodically creates a single Supershield barrier. This improved drone schematic only requires one power bar.

droneBlueprint.name: REPAIR_OLD
droneBlueprint.title: System Repair Drone
droneBlueprint.desc: Searches for damaged systems and automatically repairs them.

droneBlueprint.name: DE_REPAIR_2
droneBlueprint.title: System Repair Drone
droneBlueprint.desc: Searches for damaged systems and automatically repairs them.

droneBlueprint.name: DE_REPAIR_3
droneBlueprint.title: Leaking Repair Drone
droneBlueprint.desc: Searches for damaged systems and automatically repairs them. With malfunctioning power linkages, it needs more reactor energy.

droneBlueprint.name: DE_REPAIR_4
droneBlueprint.title: System Repair Drone
droneBlueprint.desc: Searches for damaged systems and automatically repairs them.

droneBlueprint.name: BATTLE
droneBlueprint.title: Anti-Personnel Drone
droneBlueprint.desc: Searches for and tries to destroy any intruder on board your ship.

droneBlueprint.name: DE_BATTLE_2
droneBlueprint.title: Hardened Anti-Pers. Drone
droneBlueprint.desc: Searches for and tries to destroy any intruder on board your ship. This one's got dozens of victims.

droneBlueprint.name: DE_BATTLE_3
droneBlueprint.title: Defective Anti-Pers. Drone
droneBlueprint.desc: Searches for and tries to destroy any intruder on board your ship. With malfunctioning power linkages, it needs more reactor energy.

droneBlueprint.name: DE_BATTLE_4
droneBlueprint.title: Anti-Personnel Drone
droneBlueprint.desc: Will automatically search for and try to destroy any intruder on board your ship.

droneBlueprint.name: BOARDER
droneBlueprint.title: Boarding Drone
droneBlueprint.desc: Rips through enemy hull and breaches it. Awesome!

droneBlueprint.name: DE_BOARDER_4
droneBlueprint.title: Boarding Drone
droneBlueprint.desc: After hurtling itself at an enemy ship, it breaches through enemy armor and starts dealing damage to crew and systems. Awesome!

droneBlueprint.name: DE_BOARDER_2
droneBlueprint.title: Superior Boarding Drone
droneBlueprint.desc: After hurtling itself at an enemy ship, it breaches through enemy armor and starts dealing damage to crew and systems. Its hypersonic jets enable it to dodge defense drones and more quickly begin the massacre. Mass destruction!

droneBlueprint.name: DE_BOARDER_3
droneBlueprint.title: Slow Boarding Drone
droneBlueprint.desc: After hurtling itself at an enemy ship, it breaches through enemy armor and starts dealing damage to crew and systems. Without functioning jets, this variant takes its time to get to the enemy ship, and then the massacre will begin. Calm down!

droneBlueprint.name: SHIP_REPAIR
droneBlueprint.title: Hull Repair
